alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued June 17 at 3:15AM MDT until June 18 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, south winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, south winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Beaverhead and Madison Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 9 AM this morning to 9 PM MDT this evening. For the High Wind Watch, from Saturday morning through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.
